name: Pong in Space-Blaster Pong
description:
Easy to use classic free of charge game Pong in new, modern performance. You should protect your native planet. By driving your spaceship, earn points, collect interesting bonuses, try to survive as long as possible. Each time the speed of ball increases.

Various bonuses, falling out of drowning enemies will help you to survive. Catch additional life or protection of ball from destruction. Moreover, collect additional points
